title: SPL's Internal Event: Values Challenge

content.value: Helped SPL transform their internal event into an *unforgettable, value-driven experience* that deeply engaged employees. By developing *seven interactive web-based challenges* aligned with the company's core values, I created a fun and memorable way for SPL to reinforce their principles, promote teamwork, and gather valuable employee feedback.

content.value: The LinkedIn clip shows live play: teams scan the QR, race through the seven values, and switch languages on the fly for bilingual staff.
"We cooperate and share together" turned into a co-op puzzle: one teammate scans the QR code on mobile while the other drives the main screen. It was the *most replayed* challenge of the event.
Teams tackled real SPL scenarios on touchscreens. AI evaluated answers live, rewarding clarity, empathy, and speed.
The idea lab let teams drag SPL services, AI, robotics, and cyber modules to pitch new products. We captured *150+ ideas* and immediate sentiment through quick prompts.

content.title: Impact & Wins
content.result: Felt like a game night: teams replayed, leaders got clean data, and values were experienced, not just read.

shortDescription: Developed a dynamic web-based experience for SPL's internal event, featuring seven interactive challenges designed to reinforce the company's core values and significantly boost employee engagement.
metaDescription: Discover how I helped Saudi Post Logistics (SPL) transform their internal event with a dynamic web-based experience. Seven interactive challenges, aligned with core values, engaged employees, fostered teamwork, and generated innovative ideas. Learn how I can bring similar results to your organization.
objectives: Reinforce SPL's seven core values among employees.
Create an engaging and interactive experience for the internal event.
Promote teamwork and collaboration through interactive challenges.
Deliver a high-quality experience within a tight deadline.

functionality.description: A timed puzzle game where employees assemble a picture representing "We move fast."

Two players work together, one with instructions (mobile) and the other interacting with the screen, to complete a task representing "We cooperate and share together." This challenge was the *most popular* at the event, promoting communication and teamwork among participants.
Employees draw an image representing "We commit to doing more" in three rounds, with the option to improve their drawing in each round.
Employees respond to scenarios related to "We exceed our customers' expectations," with AI evaluating their solutions.

A platform for employees to anonymously share their thoughts and experiences, representing "We are characterized by trust and transparency." This encouraged open communication, receiving *over 200 anonymous submissions* and providing SPL with valuable insights into employee sentiment.

Employees combine elements related to SPL services and innovative technologies (AI, Robotics, etc.) to create and submit new ideas, representing "We innovate solutions for the future." This challenge generated *over 150 innovative ideas* for potential future projects at SPL.
Employees solve various challenges related to SPL's services and values, representing "We always overcome challenges."

design.aesthetic: Modern, engaging, and aligned with SPL's branding, featuring a dark mode interface with vibrant accents.
design.responsiveness: All applications are responsive and function seamlessly across various devices, including touch screens and mobile devices.
design.accessibility: Designed with accessibility in mind, featuring clear text, sufficient color contrast, and keyboard navigation support.

outcomes: Successfully engaged SPL employees at the internal event.
Reinforced understanding and commitment to SPL's core values.
Provided a fun, interactive, and memorable experience.
Gathered valuable employee feedback and innovative ideas.
Demonstrated the ability to deliver a complex project under tight time constraints.

challenges.challenge: Tight Development Timeline: The project required rapid development and testing to meet the event deadline.
challenges.solution: Utilized agile development methodologies, including rapid prototyping, iterative development, and close communication with the client, to ensure timely delivery.

challenges.challenge: Ensuring Seamless Integration of Diverse Challenges: The project involved creating seven different interactive experiences, each with unique technical requirements.
challenges.solution: Employed a modular design approach and leveraged JavaScript libraries and frameworks to streamline development and ensure seamless integration between the different challenges.

challenges.challenge: Optimizing for Touch Screen Interaction: The event primarily utilized touch screen displays, requiring careful consideration of user interface and user experience design.
challenges.solution: Conducted thorough testing on touch screen devices and implemented responsive design principles to ensure optimal usability and a smooth interactive experience.

clientFeedback.feedback: The interactive challenges were a huge success at our event! Employees loved the engaging activities and how they related to our company values. Thank you for delivering such a fantastic experience within our tight deadline.
clientFeedback.author: SPL Event Coordinator

notes: This project demonstrated the successful integration of various web technologies to create a dynamic and engaging experience for a large-scale internal event. The use of AI, specifically Gemini API, for evaluating scenario-based solutions added an innovative element to the project.
